name: Old Man's Drive: Infinite Galactic Golf
name_original: Old Man's Drive: Infinite Galactic Golf
description:
It's what every retired Space Adventurer dreams of: Exploring the galaxy in search of the greatest pastime known to civilization: Golf!

Choose your warp coordinates, enter the planet's atmosphere, and survive against hostile indigenous lifeforms as you fly your Hover-buggy to wherever your ball lands

Download version has full-screen support!

Made for the SA Big Awful Jam 2016 entry

Music by Daniel Vecchitto
